<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An XCOFF object file has a limited set of predefined sections. The most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// important ones for us (right now) are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .text --&gt; contains program code and read-only data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .data --&gt; contains initialized data, function descriptors, and the TOC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .bss  --&gt; contains uninitialized data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Each of these sections is composed of &#39;Control Sections&#39;. A Control Section</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is more commonly referred to as a csect. A csect is an indivisible unit of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code or data, and acts as a container for symbols. A csect is mapped</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into a section based on its storage-mapping class, with the exception of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XMC&#95;RW which gets mapped to either .data or .bss based on whether it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// explicitly initialized or not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t represent the sections in the MC layer as there is nothing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interesting about them at at that level: they carry information that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only relevant to the ObjectWriter, so we materialize them in this class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/#a66cc8700265bf02ade5a96f6e84b3e16"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/#a66cc8700265bf02ade5a96f6e84b3e16">DefaultSectionAlign</a> = 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/#ae3b347f4debf73a40682c510853dfcc3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int16&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/#ae3b347f4debf73a40682c510853dfcc3">MaxSectionIndex</a> = INT16&#95;MAX;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/sectionentry"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/sectionentry/#a6b7a3c345f4636c39dc88bff87582e91">SectionEntry</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The physical/virtual address of the section. For an object file these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values are equivalent, except for in the overflow section header, where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the physical address specifies the number of relocation entries and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// virtual address specifies the number of line number entries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Divide Address into PhysicalAddress and VirtualAddress when line</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number entries are supported.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// XCOFF has special section numbers for symbols:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -2 Specifies N&#95;DEBUG, a special symbolic debugging symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -1 Specifies N&#95;ABS, an absolute symbol. The symbol has a value but is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relocatable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  0 Specifies N&#95;UNDEF, an undefined external symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore, we choose -3 (N&#95;DEBUG - 1) to represent a section index that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hasn&#39;t been initialized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/sectionentry/#aca6ac79c703d2fd803ec070c57709798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int16&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/sectionentry/#aca6ac79c703d2fd803ec070c57709798">UninitializedIndex</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> == XCOFF::RelocationType::R&#95;TOC ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> == XCOFF::RelocationType::R&#95;TOCL) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FixedValue = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The FixedValue should be the TOC entry offset from the TOC-base plus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any constant offset value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">      int64&#95;t TOCEntryOffset = SectionMap&#91;SymASec&#93;-&gt;Address -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               TOCCsects.front().Address + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/exp/#af7592dc94276d1958420bcfb414b6998">Target</a>.getConstant();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For small code model, if the TOCEntryOffset overflows the 16-bit value,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we truncate it back down to 16 bits. The linker will be able to insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fix-up code when needed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For non toc-data symbols, we already did the truncation in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PPCAsmPrinter.cpp through setting Target.getConstant() in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// expression above by calling getTOCEntryLoadingExprForXCOFF for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// various TOC PseudoOps.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For toc-data symbols, we were not able to calculate the offset from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the TOC in PPCAsmPrinter.cpp since the TOC has not been finalized at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that point, so we are adjusting it here though</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm::SignExtend64&lt;16&gt;(TOCEntryOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Since the time that the handling for offsets over 16-bits was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// added in PPCAsmPrinter.cpp using getTOCEntryLoadingExprForXCOFF, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// system assembler and linker have been updated to be able to handle the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overflowing offsets, so we no longer need to keep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getTOCEntryLoadingExprForXCOFF.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> == XCOFF::RelocationType::R&#95;TOC &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1a1e51a5952c3afa00875df90e7ae6f8">isInt&lt;16&gt;</a>(TOCEntryOffset))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The address of the branch instruction should be the sum of section</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address, fragment offset and Fixup offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t BRInstrAddress =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SectionMap&#91;ParentSec&#93;-&gt;Address + FixupOffsetInCsect;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The FixedValue should be the difference between symbol&#39;s virtual address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and BR instr address plus any constant value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FixedValue = getVirtualAddress(SymA, SymASec) - BRInstrAddress +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/exp/#af7592dc94276d1958420bcfb414b6998">Target</a>.getConstant();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> == XCOFF::RelocationType::R&#95;REF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The FixedValue and FixupOffsetInCsect should always be 0 since it</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FixedValue = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FixupOffsetInCsect = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> XCOFFWriter::finalizeRelocationInfo(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/sectionentry">SectionEntry</a> &#42;Sec, uint64&#95;t RelCount) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handles relocation field overflows in an XCOFF32 file. An XCOFF64 file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may not contain an overflow section header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!is64Bit() &amp;&amp; (RelCount &gt;= </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcoff/#aa4c2e75ac22d396f86f5ed6a29698bd0">XCOFF::RelocOverflow</a>))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generate an overflow section header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SectionEntry SecEntry(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.ovrflo&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcoff/#af30dc250fcc756ed99640fe2d10389aeac5d245ccdee6f92a2b232f49c0b4c41e">XCOFF::STYP&#95;OVRFLO</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This field specifies the file section number of the section header that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overflowed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SecEntry.RelocationCount = Sec-&gt;Index;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This field specifies the number of relocation entries actually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// required.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SecEntry.Address = RelCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SecEntry.Index = ++SectionCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OverflowSections.push&#95;back(std::move(SecEntry));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The field in the primary section header is always 65535</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (XCOFF::RelocOverflow).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sec-&gt;RelocationCount = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/xcoff/#aa4c2e75ac22d396f86f5ed6a29698bd0">XCOFF::RelocOverflow</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sec-&gt;RelocationCount = RelCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> XCOFFWriter::calcOffsetToRelocations(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/sectionentry">SectionEntry</a> &#42;Sec,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          uint64&#95;t &amp;RawPointer) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Sec-&gt;RelocationCount)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Sec-&gt;FileOffsetToRelocations = RawPointer;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t RelocationSizeInSec = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The size of the tail padding in a section is the end virtual address of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint64&#95;t PaddingSize =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WordSize = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(uint32&#95;t);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write out the payload one word at a time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Index + WordSize &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiltranslatemetadata-cpp/#a26b689be9525270658579553e0adfec1">Metadata</a>.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::array&lt;uint8&#95;t, WordSize&gt; LastWord = &#123;0&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ::memcpy(LastWord.data(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiltranslatemetadata-cpp/#a26b689be9525270658579553e0adfec1">Metadata</a>.data() + Index, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxiltranslatemetadata-cpp/#a26b689be9525270658579553e0adfec1">Metadata</a>.size() - Index);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">    W.write&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a7a225814d4cc0d175373f7ffc59f66b4">llvm::support::endian::read32be</a>(LastWord.data()));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Takes the log base 2 of the alignment and shifts the result into the 5 most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// significant bits of a byte, then or&#39;s in the csect type into the least</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// significant 3 bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/#a6a17294e96011f1167ca424b5aa247f6"><span class="doxyHighlight">uint8&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-xcoffobjectwriter-cpp-/#a6a17294e96011f1167ca424b5aa247f6">getEncodedType</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff">MCSectionXCOFF</a> &#42;Sec) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Log2Align = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(Sec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection/#a3908d151fa93bdc906cbf57d96060673">getAlign</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Result is a number in the range &#91;0, 31&#93; which fits in the 5 least</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// significant bits. Shift this value into the 5 most significant bits, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bitwise-or in the csect type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t EncodedAlign = Log2Align &lt;&lt; 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EncodedAlign | Sec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsectionxcoff/#af79b6732b23bd4070d16bc96bfbdbb15">getCSectType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-pwrite-stream">raw&#95;pwrite&#95;stream</a> &amp;OS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
